pt.ogTitle: Sistema para Empresa de CFTV e Seguranca | PraticOS
pt.ogDescription: Chega de retrabalho! Sistema de OS com historico do equipamento por QR code, rotas otimizadas e relatorio fotografico automatico.

hero.title: Chega de retrabalho por falta de informacao:
hero.subtitle: Acabe com a planilha e saiba exatamente onde cada equipamento esta instalado. Historico completo por QR code, rota otimizada e cliente acompanhando pelo celular.

problems.title: Voce enfrenta
problems.subtitle: Dores comuns de quem trabalha com CFTV e seguranca eletronica

items.title: Tecnico vai no endereco errado
items.text: Falta de informacao clara na OS. Tecnico perde tempo procurando o local ou vai no endereco antigo do cliente.

items.title: Sem controle de rotas
items.text: Tecnicos cruzam a cidade sem planejamento. Combustivel e tempo desperdicados todos os dias.

items.title: Cliente nao sabe quando o tecnico chega
items.text: Ligacoes constantes perguntando horario. Voce para o servico para responder WhatsApp.

items.title: Documentacao manual da dor de cabeca
items.text: OS em papel se perde, foto fica no celular do tecnico. No final, nao tem como comprovar o servico.

items.title: Relatorio fotografico demora horas
items.text: Juntar fotos, montar documento, enviar pro cliente. Tempo que poderia estar atendendo outro chamado.

items.title: Esquece da manutencao preventiva
items.text: Contrato de manutencao mensal mas so lembra quando o cliente reclama. Perde credibilidade e renovacao.

solutions.title: Como o
solutions.subtitle: Funcionalidades pensadas para o dia a dia de empresas de CFTV

items.title: OS digital com localizacao
items.text: Endereco completo com mapa integrado. Tecnico abre o Waze direto do app.

items.title: Rota otimizada do dia
items.text: Sistema organiza os atendimentos por proximidade. Menos km rodados, mais clientes atendidos.

items.title: Link para o cliente acompanhar
items.text: Cliente recebe link e ve a posicao do tecnico em tempo real.

items.title: Relatorio fotografico automatico
items.text: Fotos com data/hora e localizacao. Relatorio gerado em 1 clique para enviar ao cliente.

items.title: Gestao de servicos recorrentes
items.text: Cadastre contratos de manutencao. Sistema avisa quando esta chegando a data.

items.title: Historico do equipamento por QR code
items.text: Cole um QR code na camera/DVR. Escaneie e veja todo historico de manutencao.

checklist.title: Checklist de
checklist.text: Documente cada etapa da instalacao e evite chamados de garantia. Cliente assina digitalmente.

features.subtitle: Ferramentas poderosas e intuitivas para aumentar sua produtividade

items.title: OS Digital
items.text: Crie ordens de servico completas com fotos, localizacao e valores. Tudo organizado.

items.title: Fotos Ilimitadas
items.text: Fotografe cada etapa da instalacao. Relatorio automatico com data e hora.

items.text: Gere relatorios profissionais em PDF para enviar ao cliente. Em 1 clique.

items.title: Controle Financeiro
items.text: Veja quanto faturou, quanto recebeu e quanto tem a receber. Dashboard completo.

items.title: Gestao de Equipamentos
items.text: Historico completo de cada equipamento instalado. Todas as manutencoes anteriores.

items.title: Link de Acompanhamento
items.text: Cliente acompanha o status e localizacao do tecnico pelo celular.

testimonial.quote: Antes eu perdia muito tempo montando relatorio fotografico manualmente. Agora o PraticOS gera tudo automatico e o cliente recebe na hora. Ganhei pelo menos 2 horas por dia.
testimonial.name: Carlos Eduardo
testimonial.role: Dono de empresa de CFTV ha 8 anos

faq.title: Perguntas
faq.subtitle: Tire suas duvidas antes de comecar

items.question: Preciso pagar para usar?
items.answer: Nao! O plano gratuito e real e nao tem limite de tempo. Voce pode usar para sempre com ate 30 fotos/mes. Nossos precos sao transparentes e voce nao precisa falar com vendedor.

items.question: Funciona para instalacao e manutencao?
items.answer: Sim! PraticOS funciona tanto para instalacoes novas quanto para manutencoes preventivas e corretivas. O sistema se adapta ao seu fluxo de trabalho.

items.question: Consigo controlar contratos de manutencao?
items.answer: Sim! Cadastre servicos recorrentes e o sistema avisa automaticamente quando esta chegando a data. Nunca mais perca uma preventiva.

items.question: O QR code do equipamento funciona como?
items.answer: Voce gera um QR code unico para cada equipamento. Cole na camera ou DVR. Quando precisar, escaneie e veja todo o historico de manutencao na hora.

items.question: E se eu precisar de ajuda?
items.answer: Temos suporte por email e documentacao completa. Respondemos em ate 24 horas uteis. Nosso time conhece o dia a dia de empresas de CFTV.

en.title: CCTV & Security Company Management | PraticOS
en.description: Stop rework due to missing information! Work order system for CCTV and security companies with equipment history, optimized routes and photo reports. Get organized in 5 minutes.
en.keywords: cctv company software, security company management, work order system cctv, camera installation app, security business software
en.ogDescription: Stop rework! WO system with equipment history by QR code, optimized routes and automatic photo reports.

hero.title: Stop rework due to missing information:
hero.subtitle: Ditch the spreadsheet and know exactly where each equipment is installed. Complete history by QR code, optimized routes and customer tracking on their phone.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for CCTV and electronic security companies

items.title: Technician goes to wrong address
items.text: Lack of clear information on the WO. Technician wastes time searching for the location or goes to customer's old address.

items.title: No route control
items.text: Technicians cross the city without planning. Fuel and time wasted every day.

items.title: Customer doesn't know when technician arrives
items.text: Constant calls asking about arrival time. You stop working to answer WhatsApp.

items.title: Manual documentation is a headache
items.text: Paper WOs get lost, photos stay on technician's phone. In the end, no way to prove the service.

items.title: Photo report takes hours
items.text: Gathering photos, creating document, sending to client. Time that could be spent on another job.

items.title: Forget preventive maintenance
items.text: Monthly maintenance contract but only remember when customer complains. Lose credibility and renewal.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for daily CCTV company operations

items.title: Digital WO with location
items.text: Complete address with integrated map. Technician opens Waze directly from the app.
items.highlight: Zero rework due to wrong address.

items.title: Optimized daily route
items.text: System organizes appointments by proximity. Less miles driven, more customers served.

items.title: Link for customer tracking
items.text: Customer receives link and sees technician's position in real time.

items.title: Automatic photo report
items.text: Photos with date/time and location. Report generated in 1 click to send to customer.

items.title: Recurring service management
items.text: Register maintenance contracts. System alerts when date is approaching.

items.title: Equipment history by QR code
items.text: Stick a QR code on camera/DVR. Scan and see complete maintenance history.

checklist.title: CCTV
checklist.text: Document each installation step and avoid warranty calls. Customer signs digitally.

items.text: Before and after installation photos
Automatic GPS location
Test of each installed camera
DVR/NVR configurations
Remote access configured
Customer digital signature

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful and intuitive tools to boost your productivity

items.title: Digital WO
items.text: Create complete work orders with photos, location and values. All organized.

items.title: Unlimited Photos
items.text: Photograph each installation step. Automatic report with date and time.

items.title: PDF Report
items.text: Generate professional PDF reports to send to customers. In 1 click.

items.title: Financial Control
items.text: See how much you billed, received and have to receive. Complete dashboard.

items.title: Equipment Management
items.text: Complete history of each installed equipment. All previous maintenance.

items.title: Tracking Link
items.text: Customer tracks technician status and location on their phone.

testimonial.quote: Before I wasted a lot of time manually creating photo reports. Now PraticOS generates everything automatically and the customer receives it instantly. I gained at least 2 hours a day.
testimonial.name: Carlos Eduardo

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent and you don't need to talk to a salesperson.

items.question: Does it work for installation and maintenance?
items.answer: Yes! PraticOS works for both new installations and preventive/corrective maintenance. The system adapts to your workflow.

items.question: Can I control maintenance contracts?
items.answer: Yes! Register recurring services and the system automatically alerts when the date is approaching. Never miss a preventive again.

items.question: How does the equipment QR code work?
items.answer: You generate a unique QR code for each equipment. Stick it on the camera or DVR. When needed, scan and see the complete maintenance history instantly.

items.question: What if I need help?
items.answer: We have email support and complete documentation. We respond within 24 business hours. Our team knows the daily routine of CCTV companies.

download.title: Download now and
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
